file_content.text: At this moment in time, you people are the Republic's greatest heroes.
Havoc Squad! You should have heard their holofrequencies squawking.
Who are you, stranger? The entire base is in a panic. Nobody knows what to make of it.
The leaders, their guards--you even annihilated their entire droid security force for what, good measure?
That was an amazing surgical strike.
Tomorrow, violent splinter groups all over the Republic will wake up without leaders or direction. And we'll all sleep a bit sounder.
[Establishing contact with Field Agent Burne. Incoming message is text-only.]
